name: Maybe Next Year
description:
This year is the year in which I want to improve myself.

I want to be more sporty, I want to learn to play guitar, I want to make more money, I want to be a real Activist, I want ..., I want...,I want.

Controls

Use ARROW LEFT (or A) , ARROW DOWN (or S), ARROW RIGHT (or D) to move.

Press ALT+F4 to exit the game

So What?

The game represents the effors that everyone does to be a better person every year.

Going down (ARROW DOWN) you follow the main (easier) path that increments the date.

But you can deviate (with LEFT or RIGHT ARROW) from the main path following other more intricated paths

This should improve more and more your skills but it requires to do a longer path.
